subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Lackluster play by the Jayhawks’ guards is a concern heading into the Round of 16. Ben McLemore is in a slump, a reason the No. 4 seed Wolverines are suddenly considered a favorite.
snippet: Lackluster play by the Jayhawks’ guards is a concern heading into the Round of 16. Ben McLemore is in a slump, a reason the No. 4 seed Wolverines are suddenly considered a favorite.
